title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Nearby Cities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions     Nearby Cities              Nearby Cities         Valles Caldera is close to several New Mexico cities.   Cities within 20 miles of the Preserve's Boundaries:   Jemez Springs, NM  Los Alamos, NM    Cities within 100 miles of the Preserve's Boundaries:    Albuquerque, NM  Bernalillo, NM  Corrales, NM  Jemez Pueblo, NM  Rio Rancho, NM  Santa Clara Pueblo, NM  Santa Fe, NM  Taos, NM    Other Visitor Resources:    Official New Mexico Travel Website  Official Los Alamos County Visitors Website  Official Sandoval County Visitors Website
